para.text: Before running PEST, you must first activate PEST and run the model from ModelMuse. The batch file to run the model will contain a command to create an instruction file for PEST. There will be a related command in the RunModel.bat batch file that will extract the simulated values corresponding to the observations in the format described by the instruction file.
